posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mark
T3 Merkle, graded PSA 2 MK.  I have no clue why it received the MK qualifier.  Can't find any marking at all on the card.  Very nice for a grade of 2.  $225 delivered.

T3 Mullin, PSA 1.  Pinhole in the top border, otherwise a very nice card.  $130 delivered.

Scans available.

Posted By: jim
Sent an e-mail request on 13 Nov 2008 asking for front/back scans on the PSA 2 T3 Merkle. Still would like to see them or at least get a reply that the card is no longer available.
